text: Footnotes in Obsidian Footnotes can be declared by putting, eg. [*1] after some text. Anywhere else in the note you declare the content of the footnote with [*1]:. | would like to give this text a reference!/ You can add the contents of the reference in-line as well with A[in-Line reference] In this case I'll just make a citation / in-line. Citations can contain links, formatting and backlinks | gave a quote in an earlier note/*/ Notice that it automatically adjusts the numbering of the footnotes in display view The content of the reference in-line citation Halasz, Frank G. (July 1988). "Reflections on NoteCards: Seven Issues for the Next Generation of Hypermedia Systems"rm. Communications of the ACM 7. 31 (7): 836- 852. doi7:10.1145/48511.48514 ->.
